contentList.content: Vom Griff dieser Streitaxt bis zum Axtkopf erstrecken sich üppige Sussurwurzeln. Sie sehnt sich nach Magie und bringt jede Kreatur, die sie berührt, zum Schweigen.
Sated Sussur roots extend from this daggers's hilt into the blade head itself. It yearns to drink magic, silencing every creature it strikes.
Sated Sussur roots extend throughout this flail into the striking head. It yearns to drink magic, silencing every creature it strikes.

Use the power of the mighty Sussur tree infused with your weapon to nullify any spell of 6th level or lower instantly. If the spell being countered is 7th, 8th or 9th level you must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag> to nullify it, the difficulty of which is based on the spell's Level.
Force a creature fail when it casts a spell. Spells of 6th level or lower can always be interrupted. Higher level spells are harder.
This passive exists only to enable Sussur weapons to silence when thrown.
